Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #a Deku Shield#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Bomb Bag#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Double Defense#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Double Defense#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Zora Tunic#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Zora Tunic#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #the Prelude of Light#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #a Deku Shield#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #the Prelude of Light#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Epona's Song#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Bomb Bag#.
